EmailTemplate.name: Jimmy Kyung Email 2.Jimmy Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, got a second?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I hope you're doing well! I'm not sure if you saw my previous email, but my name is Jimmy and I'll be supporting your company’s account from now on. I want to take a moment to once again say an official hello.
I’ve researched your company, and I’m thrilled to be working with you. I want to let you know that I’m here to listen to you and do my best to support all efforts to meet your needs.
Are you available for a quick chat so we can connect over the phone?
Thank you,
Jimmy Kyung Inside Account Manager
Providing you with the products, services and solutions your business needs to be more productive and successful.
If you no longer wish to receive emails from Grand & Toy please click here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Unsubscribe.html]]> to update your preferences.
200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: JimmyKyung@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:JimmyKyung@grandandtoy.com]]> | Toll Free: 1-800-478-9405 x86402 Direct: 416-401-6402 | Web: grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.
